item.title: Color and Chroma Difference Algorithm Research
item.description: Professional image qualuty analysis softwares such as Imatest and iQ-analyzer provide objective, comprehensive, and consistent evaluations of camera image quality. In our practical experience, we have observed that different software employs varying algorithms for calculating the color difference. To enable efficient automated image analysis, we conducted extensive experimental studies to uncover the color difference algorithms employed by various softwares. This work will discuss the advantages, disadvantages, and implementation specifics of the two algorithms.
